Posts.Content: Next week I'm due to go in and have a skin sparing mastectomy after being diagnosed with Pagets disease - a breast cancer most people wrongly think is for older ladies, I'm 32. I'm absolutely terrified and have absolutely no idea what to expect - can anyone help? Would love to understand what to actually feels like and what to expect - sensations, feelings / emotions etc?Â
Posts.Title: Days away from 1st surgery....terrified
